{{cpp/chrono/title|year_month_weekday_last}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month_weekday_last/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
class year_month_weekday_last;
}}

The class {{tt|year_month_weekday_last}} represents the last weekday of a specific year and month. It is a field-based time point, with a resolution of {{lc|std::chrono::days}}, except that it is limited to pointing to the last weekday of a year and month. {{lc|std::chrono::years}}- and {{lc|std::chrono::months}}-oriented arithmetic are supported directly. An implicit conversion to {{lc|std::chrono::sys_days}} allows {{lc|std::chrono::days}}-oriented arithmetic to be performed efficiently.

{{tt|year_month_weekday_last}} is a {{named req|TriviallyCopyable}} {{named req|StandardLayoutType}}.
